newsitem.title: USA: Electric & Gas Technology completes sale.
newsitem.headline: Electric & Gas Technology completes sale.

text.p: Electric & Gas Technology Inc said on Tuesday it completed the sale of its metal fabrication subsidiary, Logic Design Metals Inc.
In a statement, ELGT said it received roughly $21.5 million dollars for the unit from Chatham Corp, an affiliate of Kidd & Co.
Proceeds from the deal are being used to repay about $6 million of corporate debt, the company added, with the balance to be channeled into short term liquid investments.
